OrgName: Intelligent Business Entertainment, Inc. d/b/a True Office
activities:
True Office provides interactive training services to corporate customers, which offer or require its employees to complete the training.  We may request that employees, or their employers, provide personally identifiable information, including email address, username and/or other information from which the user’s identity is or may be discernible. We may also solicit responses to survey questions, quizzes or other inquiries incorporated into the services we provide. The information we collect may be stored on our servers, and on the servers of third party service providers.

Please find the True Office Privacy Policy, in its entirety, attached as Exhibit 1.
a)	where the privacy policy is available for viewing by the public,
a.	on the True Office website, at “www.trueoffice.com”

b)	its effective date of implementation,
a.	The True Office Privacy Policy was effective as of July 17, 2013

c)	a contact office for the handling of complaints, access requests, and any other issues arising under the Safe Harbor,
a.	True Office can be contacted at either support@trueoffice.com or privacy@trueoffice.com


d)	the specific statutory body that has jurisdiction to hear any claims against the organization regarding possible unfair or deceptive practices and violations of laws or regulations governing privacy (and that is listed in the annex to the Principles),
a.	U.S. Federal Trade Commission

e)	name of any privacy programs in which the organization is a member,
a.	None

f)	method of verification (e.g. in-house, third party), and 
a.	Method of verification is in-house

g)	the independent recourse mechanism that is available to investigate unresolved complaints.
a.	True Office has joined the EU Safe Harbor DPA
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization (employer), may receive email address, and the data we collect includes employee's performance on training courses (e.g. answers to test questions, policy attestation, etc)
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
